requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Gigabyte PCI-ex GeForce GT 710
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
